Method LCMC

Source: R/quality.R
LCMC-dimRedResult-method.Rd

Calculates the Local Continuity Meta Criterion, which is Q_NX adjusted for random overlap inside the K-ary neighborhood.

Usage

# S4 method for class 'dimRedResult'
LCMC(object)

Arguments

object

of class dimRedResult
